content: 5 p6 k5 6 rs s1 k4 5 k2tog k2 ssk k5 6 ws s1 k4 5 p4 k5 6 rs s1 k4 5 k2tog ssk k5 6 ws s1 k to end rs s1 k to end ws s1 k to end rs s1 k to end ws switch to 4mm straights s1 k to end straps rs k5 5 5 6 7 attach yarn for left strap k5 5 5 6 7 work both straps separately at the same time in garter stitch until they measure 6 6 5 7 7 7 5 bind off finishing cinch up the hole in the crotch by collecting the purl bumps around the hole onto darning needle and pulling weave in ends sew buttons to straps try those overalls on before the imp gets away
